info.description: A modern RESTful API for managing travel plans, including trips, destinations, accommodations, places, and restaurants.
info.title: Travel Planning API

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific accommodation
Retrieve detailed information about a specific place
Retrieve detailed information about a specific restaurant

post.description: Import destination data from a CSV file
Import hotel data from a CSV file
Import place data from a CSV file
Import restaurant data from a CSV file
Get accommodation suggestions based on travel preferences
Get comprehensive suggestions based on travel preferences for accommodations, places, and restaurants
Get activity suggestions based on travel preferences
Get restaurant suggestions based on travel preferences
Create a new trip with destinations, accommodations, activities, and restaurants
Get AI-generated trip suggestions based on user preferences

put.description: Update an existing trip with new details including destinations, accommodations, activities, and restaurants
put.summary: Save changes to an existing trip

get.description: Get complete trip details including destinations, accommodations, activities, and restaurants

description.description: Detailed description of the todo item
description.example: Write comprehensive documentation for the API endpoints

status.description: Current status of the todo item (pending, in-progress, completed)

access_token.description: The access token, used for subsequent requests.

refresh_token.description: Optional refresh token, used for obtaining new access tokens.

model.Todo.description: Todo represents a single todo item with its details

created_at.description: Timestamp when the todo was created

description.description: Detailed description of the todo item
description.example: Write comprehensive documentation for the API endpoints

status.description: Current status of the todo item (pending, in-progress, completed)

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the todo was last updated

Bearer.description: Enter the token with the `Bearer: ` prefix, e.g. "Bearer abcde12345".
Bearer.name: Authorization

tags.description: Operations about trips and travel plans
tags.name: trip

tags.description: Operations for importing data from CSV files
tags.name: InsertData
